title: StabilityApp
text: Provides tools Genotype Environment Interaction (GEI) analysis, using statistical models visualizations assess genotype performance across environments. helps researchers explore interaction effects, stability, adaptability multi-environment trials, identifying best-performing genotypes different conditions.
